title: Oh Myyy! Submit Your Spring 2013 Application Today to Join the #500Strong Fleet!
content: Looking for an interstellar adventure to make your startup go hyperspeed? Applications for our Spring 2013 Accelerator Program have been open for over a week now, so If you think you’re up for the challenge, we’d like to invite you to join our crew. Just head over to our AngelList page to submit your official Starship 500 enlistment forms. Have questions about how we pick companies for our accelerator program? Check out our detailed FAQ for all the information you need. Our next cadet class (codename: “Batch 6”) blasts off in April, so get your application in by March 1st. Good luck, brave startup-ers!
